original_text: Then the Israelite leaders and officers agreed to offer gifts to help the Lord's work. They included the leaders of clans and the leaders of Israel's tribes, the army officers who led 1,000 men and who led 100 men, and the officers with authority for the king's work.
korean_text: 이에 모든 가문의 지도자들과 이스라엘 모든 지파의 지도자들과 천부장과 백부장과 왕의 사무관이 다 즐거이 드리되

sentences.original_text: Then the Israelite leaders and officers agreed
to offer gifts to help the Lord's work
sentences.korean_translation: 주님의 일을 돕기 위해 예물을 바치기로

sentences.original_text: They included the leaders of clans
and the leaders of Israel's tribes
the army officers who led 1,000 men
